repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The Saundaryalaharīvyākhyāna, attributed to Śaṅkara, with the Lakṣmīdharā commentary. Text and commentary in Sanskrit. This manuscript should logically have been attributed a shelfmark 'Sanscrit' rather than 'Indien' in the BnF collection.
Written by Rāmasvāli Śāstrin in the year Parābhava of the Jovian cycle, that is, most probably CE 1846-1847.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (April 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

support.p: Different types of papers: thiner for U1, f93-f95.

collation.desc: the front cover. Selfmark on the verso.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Shelfmarks on the recto. Verso blank.
2 folios = front guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
95 folios = Saundaryalaharīvyākhyāna, with Lakṣmīdharā interspersed. Original Tamil pagination: 1-129, 1 unpaginated page, 130-188. Parallel Arabic library foliation 1-95.
2 folios = back guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation. The binding is partly unbound.

additions.desc: Title in Roman transcription printed in golder letters on the spine: SAONDARYALAHARI VYAKHYANAM.
BnF shelfmark sticker Indien 500 (front cover, verso).
BnF Shelfmarks Tam. 500 in black ink and Tamoul N° 500 in black pencil (f[1]r).
BnF stamps BIBLIOTHÈQUE IMPÉRIALE MSS. (U1, f1r and f95r) and DON N° (f[1]r).
Stamp SOCIÉTÉ ASIATIQUE DON COLLECTION ARIEL (f[1]r).
Corrections in later black ink. Crossed-out portions.

binding.p: Leather (brown) covers. Title and decoration on the spine.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year parābhava of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1846-1847, etc. See colophon (U1, f95r21). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

Saundaryalaharī. 1976. Saundaryalaharī of Śrī Śaṅkara Bhagavatpādācarya with Commentaries (in Sanskrit) Lakṣmīdharā, [etc.]. Edited by A. Kuppuswami. Madras.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 70, no. 500.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 114r, no. 500.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
